column1: The Pit Room////I thought the assortment of pickled carrots and pickle slices
column3: and onions at the condiment bar were a nice touch. Still
column4: this didn't make up for my sadness that only the beef ribs were amazing while other aspects subpar. I'd come again for those alone
column5: but there are probably better BBQ joints in Houston for all-around BBQ proficiency.
